text: Commsgrad is trialling a new offering to the platform called ‘Book an A+ Commsgrad freelancer’. You can book a Commsgrad freelancer for either the day or for 4-day bundles. All you have to do is place your booking via the platform, and leave the rest to us https://t.co/hLfyNRJfSW

At Commsgrad, we are dedicated to turning the dial on diversity in the communications industry, which is why we believe shEqual and @un_stereotype are powerful resources in combatting gender inequality in advertising. To read more about their efforts, hit the link below.

Within the fast-paced nature of the communications industry, professionals need to be ready to adapt to new technologies and apps to ensure efficiency. We’ve put together our favourite tools to maximise productivity so that you can stay on top of your work
https://t.co/cmFORbx0dU

We've changed the way that internships are assigned at Commsgrad. We are now posting monthly listings that can be claimed by filling out a form. Check out our Available Internships Page to see the kind of opportunities that are available to our Commsgrads. https://t.co/t0sJCoT7MK
